title: We've been in a trade war for three decades, says Belpointe's David Nelson
text:
We've been in a trade war for three decades, says Belpointe's David Nelson 12:25am IST - 03:38 
The playing field hasn't been leveled with China and a lot of our trading partners around the world, says David Nelson, chief strategist at Belpointe. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
